meanings.definition: Thrombocytes: blood cells that help in the clotting process.
meanings.sent1: The thrombocytes quickly came together to stop the bleeding.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on thrombocytes to prevent excessive bleeding during surgery.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous thrombocytes decided to throw a clotting party in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny superheroes, thrombocytes rush to the rescue when there's a cut.
meanings.sent5: Imagine thrombocytes as tiny repair workers fixing leaks in the blood vessels.
